titles.title: Shin no Nakama ja Nai to Yuusha no Party wo Oidasareta node, Henkyou de Slow Life suru Koto ni Shimashita
I Was Kicked out of the Hero's Party Because I Wasn't a True Companion so I Decided to Have a Slow Life at the Frontier
真の仲間じゃないと勇者のパーティーを追い出されたので、辺境でスローライフすることにしました
Banished from the Hero's Party, I Decided to Live a Quiet Life in the Countryside

title: Shin no Nakama ja Nai to Yuusha no Party wo Oidasareta node, Henkyou de Slow Life suru Koto ni Shimashita
title_english: Banished from the Hero's Party, I Decided to Live a Quiet Life in the Countryside
title_japanese: 真の仲間じゃないと勇者のパーティーを追い出されたので、辺境でスローライフすることにしました
title_synonyms: I Was Kicked out of the Hero's Party Because I Wasn't a True Companion so I Decided to Have a Slow Life at the Frontier
synopsis:
Red was once a member of the Hero's party, a powerful group destined to save the world from the evil forces of Taraxon, the Raging Demon Lord. That is, until one of his comrades kicked him out. Hoping to live the easy life on the frontier, Red's new goal is to open an apothecary. However, keeping the secret of his former life may not be as simple as he thinks. Especially when the beautiful Rit, an adventurer from his past, shows up and asks to move in with him!

(Source: Yen Press)
background: Shin no Nakama ja Nai to Yuusha no Party wo Oidasareta node, Henkyou de Slow Life suru Koto ni Shimashita began as a web novel on Shousetsuka ni Narou on October 21, 2017. A revised and illustrated version has been published by Kadokawa under its Kadokawa Sneaker Bunko label since June 1, 2018. The series has been published in English as Banished from the Hero's Party, I Decided to Live a Quiet Life in the Countryside by Yen Press under the Yen On imprint since September 22, 2020.
